sheet.title: Frostfire, a Hobbit Born with the Power to Control the Tides
sheet.family: Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee, both hobbits who were born with the power to control the tides.
sheet.occupation: a hobbit, known as a dragonlind, with a special bond with their homeland.
sheet.physical_appearance: a hobbit has a slender build and a long, flowing beard.
sheet.clothing: a hobbit's robe with a dragon's scales, a cloak of shimmering gold and silver.
sheet.food_preferences: a hobbit's staple food is salt, often found in their homeland of the Misty Mountains.
sheet.background_story: a hobbit born with the power to control the tides, a gift he passed on to his father, the king.
sheet.personality_traits: a hobbit is quick-witted and resourceful, always thinking outside the box.
sheet.quote: I am not afraid of the sea, for the sea is not afraid of me.
